word: Then the suffering Jesus, his sacrifice and love so deep, as to give his life for them, was again held up before me; and then the lives of those who professed to be his followers, who had this world's goods, and considered it so great a thing to help the cause of salvation. The angel said, \93Can such enter heaven?\94 Another angel answered, \93No, never, never, never. Those who are not interested in the cause of God on earth, can never sing the song of redeeming love above.\94
